TIED TOKENS

Yet another project for the issue of synthetic tokens

 

What is a synthetic token?

A synthetic token is a token whose price is tied to the price of the underlying asset - another token, fiat asset or portfolio.

How a User can use synthetic tokens

The user can issue and burn synthetic tokens, as well as buy and sell them, receiving speculative profit due to changes in the price of the underlying asset

New User experience

The goal of the project is to create an ecosystem of synthetic tokens for the use of which a standard infrastructure is sufficient - wallets and DeFi services. No special web interface or applications are required to issue/burn synthetic tokens. Thanks to this, the product becomes truly decentralized, it does not depend on developers even in terms of the user interface.
